website_summaries.verdict: An affordable option that offers the same protection as many other brands.
pros: Offered in sizes medium to XXXL
Zipper-front design makes it easy to put on and take off
Two vertical and two horizontal two-inch reflective stripes on the front and back
cons: The polyester material is not breathable and can be uncomfortable in hot weather

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I won't lie. I bought this for my 16 yr old son as a gag gift. Imagine my shock in the quality. I am a firm believer in you get what you pay for, but this vest's quality exceeded my expectations. It isn't high quality, but better quality than one would expect for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Goleb

customer_reviews.title: A good, inexpensive, occasional use item
customer_reviews.text: What can I say. The vest is reflective and highly visible during both the day and at night, so it does exactly was its supposed to. There are a couple things to consider though if you're considering this product. One, this is not a daily use, heavy duty product. The price point should have tipped you off to that reality. However, for occasional general use, the vest will likely hold up fine. Two, these vests run small in size. I typically would order an XL (I'm 6'2" and 225 pounds) but had to order an XXL, which fits me great. Just take that into consideration when ordering. Other than that, I think this is an excellent product for the money.
customer_reviews.author: bigdeal

customer_reviews.title: Ordered up a size based on reviews. That was a mistake. Too big
customer_reviews.text: I am 5ft 5in 108 lbs. and wear lots of layers when I walk the dog. I wanted this vest to fit over a fleece and jacket in the winter, and not be too restrictive. Based on the reviews, I ordered a size Large (when I should have ordered a Medium). The Large is hugely baggy with probably 8 extra inches of belly room even with two jackets. It is a nice bright vest and other than my ordering the wrong size based on reviews (saying to size up), it still deserves 5 stars. I'll still wear it...even though it is huge. I bought it for safety and not to be fashionable.
customer_reviews.author: DC from NC

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy Garment, Sized too Small
customer_reviews.text: This is a very flimsy garment with a cheap, plastic zipper that looks like it will break after four or five zippings, one of those that has a tag that looks like it was made of matchbox car metal. I ordered an XL but the vest was more sized like a medium. The garment was poorly sewn with threads sticking out everywhere. This is not a durable, functional piece of safety equipment. Don't buy it
customer_reviews.author: Michael Smith

customer_reviews.title: A BRIGHT IDEA!
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought this to replace an older vest I had been using when riding my motorcycle, in the interest of conspicuity. This is very bright and shows up well whether I'm riding day or night. This one fits perfectly snug over my summer jacket, so it doesn't flap in the wind. I'm now considering buying the next size up for my larger, heavier, early Spring / late Fall jacket as well! 'Really good price for what I regard as an essential piece of motorcycling gear.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gustafson

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous Prop 65
customer_reviews.text: For your safety, please be aware that this listing contains DEHP. There’s a proposition 65 warning on the packaging. I would not have bought it had I known. Please stop making products that are harmful.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Don't Wash it!
customer_reviews.text: I have to wear safety vests all day and sometimes I am in the sun most of the day and I sweat. I washed this one twice so far and the "reflectiveness" is fading. I washed it on gentle and still no luck. I won't be buying this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Good vest, great value
customer_reviews.text: We bought a stack of these vests and had our logo silkscreened on the back locally. We hand them out to visitors and other on job sites who forgot to bring their own. These are nice and bright and breathe. The vests do run a little small, something to keep in mind if a hoodie or similar is to be worn beneath. We may have have gotten a freak batch, but all of the vests in three different sizes ordered had the zipper pull sewn onto the wrong side. In other words, if wearing, the tongue is on the left. If doesn't affect the utility in any way, just odd.
customer_reviews.author: Jon E. Dill

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, great price
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to use during home deliveries and used it once I switched jobs in the industrial industry. Amazing price for the quality. High visibility, very bright neon yellow, and the reflective strips work perfectly. It does run a bit loose and wouldn't use or recommend for working out outdoors as it does move side-to-side and up-and-down easily. I have a very dirty job working around types of coal and fuel that usually stains my clothing easily but this vest was resistant to it and was easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: J. Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Item ok, but not for long term usage
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item due to our company has moved from Orange Vests to High Visibility Yellow Vests. Pros: Fast delivery, Item fit as purchased. Cons: After one week the stitching is starting to come apart - Vest is pretty thin not very heavy material I purchased this item to wear on the outside of my coat. The vest fit well and is very visible. The issue I have had is the stitching where the grey stripes are is coming apart. I have not washed the vest yet so the washing machine is not the reason.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny D

customer_reviews.title: LIGHTS UP VERY WELL!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a large. I am 5 foot 7 and about 170lbs. I wear medium shirts usually. This large fits over my medium size motorcycle jacket with a little room to spare. If i bought a medium, i think it might have been a little too tight, so this is perfect. It has a zipper which is nice. for $7 i feel like you can't beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Christiani

customer_reviews.title: I wear on motorcycle at night
customer_reviews.text: I wear this when riding at night on my motorcycles. I wear it over a protective leather motorcycle jacket. Yes, I look like a dork. No, I don't care. It's super reflective! Bikers are difficult to see at night. If I could paint my CBR1000RR or other bikes in paint as reflective as this vest, I would do it. Side benefit, it's easier to clean dead bugs off of this than to clean bugs off of leather.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan B

customer_reviews.title: Great best and a great price
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality vest. I can’t say I’ve ever seen one with a zipper like this, not that I’ve really paid attention before needing one myself, but I really like it. I’ve used velcro vests in the last and they always felt weird and older ones come loose constantly. With the zipper it’s never going to come loose. It does come a little small, I listened to the reviews and got a size bigger than I would normally get and it’s a nice fit. I’ll purchase another one when this one starts falling apart, but I hope that’s not for some time!
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a nice light weight vest, but . . .
customer_reviews.text: The size runs quite a bit too small. I ordered a large. I have a 39 inch waist and probably about a 46-48 inch chest. When I put it on, I couldn't zip it. The sides couldn't meet. There was about a 2-3 inch gap between the sides, and all I had on was a tee shirt. Not worth returning for $7.00, I'm sure one of my (teen) grand kids can wear it. I will re-order, but an 2x this time.
customer_reviews.author: Ec

customer_reviews.title: Much smaller than anticipated
customer_reviews.text: I'm a solid medium in just about everything so I ordered this vest in Medium. It's very short and is small for a medium, almost like it's a women's medium. Use this for your own purchasing info, otherwise it's a good vest.
customer_reviews.author: Darthgarrett

customer_reviews.title: She only has to cross one road while walking there and it is generally pretty slow. This vest easily fits over her and ...
customer_reviews.text: Following a bit of a scare I purchased this for my 11 year old daughter. She helps teach dance at the local dance studio (1.5 blocks away). She only has to cross one road while walking there and it is generally pretty slow. This vest easily fits over her and her winter coat and is VERY visible when near any type of light source (flashlight, streetlamp, auto headlights). My daughter uses the "flashlight" on her phone to light up the jacket while walking two and from the dance studio. I swear it is like looking at the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Size runs small, light weight material, decent zipper quality and reflective material.
customer_reviews.text: The item was received on time and as promised. Thin light weight material. Reflective material was good quality. The zipper quality was decent. The sizing of this garment runs small, order at least one size bigger than you would normally get. If you are going to wear it over a bulky coat, consider ordering 2 sizes bigger. Four stars because of the sizing.
customer_reviews.author: Jack M.

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size up as some reviewers suggested, but I wish I would have ordered my normal size. I ordered a Large and it fits as I would expect a large sized shirt to fit. Of course you would need to order a larger size if you want it to fit over a jacket just as you wouldn't expect your regular t-shirts to fit over a jacket. I wear medium shirts and would prefer a fitted size for warm weather, but I'll keep the large for cold weather.
customer_reviews.author: D&N Thurston

customer_reviews.title: Agressively yellow
customer_reviews.text: this thing works great. every time i race out on my bike into oncoming traffic, drivers are slamming the brakes and violently swerving around me left and right. I can see them shielding their eyes from the blinding effects of the reflective strips, combined with the 80000 lumen effect of the yellow from the vest. I emerge unscathed from every busy intersection, busy highway, and American Kennel Club Dog Show. I can be seen from the dark side of the moon.
customer_reviews.author: James A. Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable quality for occasional use
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. Reasonable quality for occasional use. I bought this because I went to the trash transfer station with some home project waste and they required a hi-visablity vest. Well they just so happened they sell them too. $2 for a sheet of thin orange plastic with a head hole. So I now carry the neiko vest. I'll also use it for other hazardous traffic exposure.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Decent safety vest but a bit of a challenge for senior dexterity
customer_reviews.text: I bought XL for my mother as safety measure when she walks, especially when crossing streets. It is definitely designed for men because the shoulder and arm hole are much wider for female shape (the girth works for her if wearing outside a fleece jacket). The zipper is not senior friendly because it is hard to zip up and tab is very small. The reflective strips and neon color are big help to alert drivers. This vest is higher in visibility than the vest designed for runners (I also got one for my mother).
customer_reviews.author: Anony MouseTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Nice lightweight vest; very bright
customer_reviews.text: I volunteer occasionally on building projects which require a high vis vest, and this fits my needs. I am a petite woman and the medium gives me plenty of room. I especially like that it has a zipper. If you need this vest on an everyday basis for heavy construction, I do not know if it will hold up. But for my needs, or for a runner or cyclist, this is a nice product for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Shop82

customer_reviews.title: Great gift to new teen for first car!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a brand new teen driver who just got their first car. Great reminder to be careful and safe if they need to be outside the car. Easy on and great for day and night. This is the second time I’ve given this to a first time teen car owner. I give a package with the vest, reflective triangles, and a car charger.
customer_reviews.author: DCS1204

customer_reviews.title: Came damaged
customer_reviews.text: Took the vest out of the package and the zipper piece on one side was almost completely unraveled. I would have returned but my husband needed it immediately, and since I sew, I fixed it myself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: To the Barricades!
customer_reviews.text: Aux armes, citoyens Formez vos bataillons Marchons ! Marchons ! Qu'un sang impur Abreuve nos sillons! If you have not heard of the gilets jaunes (yellow vests) in France, you need to. I bought this to express my solidarity with my working class brothers and sisters in France. Order yours today.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Griffin

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I was looking for. It's highly visible in the dark and low light environment. It's not too thick so I can just fold it neatly and keep it in my bag. For your information, this vest doesn't have any pocket. I ordered size M. It fits both my husband and me well. My husband always wear M on all brands of shirt. I wear size 8 women. It's not a tight fit for us. It's just right.
customer_reviews.author: Tofu

customer_reviews.title: Neiko 53941A High Visibility💞
customer_reviews.text: My son has been given the responsibility of opening car doors for children when parent drop them off at school.Unfortunately, his school ran out of safety jackets so he was the only one without one. I checked Amazon and I knew the Neiko 53941A High Visibility would be right for him. I even let him put it on for our morning power walks around the school so cars can see him. I got him a large he's 168 and losing and he wears a hoodie and two other shirts with it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Cupcake900

customer_reviews.title: Compact enough to scrunch up on bike
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so that when my son goes out riding at night people can see him. He was very happy with it and it was light. The picture here is it folded up as tight as possible so you can figure out if this would work for you. FYI - I was so happy with this I bought another one for my other child.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon G

customer_reviews.title: Check the sizing before ordering.
customer_reviews.text: I wear a medium touring motorcycle jacket and ordered a large hi vis vest to go over the jacket. It is a bit tight, I can still use it, but I should have ordered an extra large. The good part about the snug fit, I will not have to deal with it flapping in the breeze. The price is good as it seems like just about everything is made in China now. China has problems with toxic materials getting into the products they send to the US- animal feed, lead paint on children toys, engineered wood flooring are just a few examples. I have not tested this for toxic chemicals yet.
customer_reviews.author: Robert  C

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, lightweight, no pockets, runs one size large, uncertain about long-term durability
customer_reviews.text: Affordable and lightweight (which is good because you don't want to get overheated wearing this in summer). The size Large vest I got felt like a Medium when worn over a sweatshirt. Meets ANSI specs for construction and highway workers. It uses a zipper (some have velcro or other closures); the zipper feels inexpensively made so I'm wondering how long it will hold up. It has no pockets. Purchased for walking at dusk so it won't get really heavy use. I may need to purchase an XL for winter wear over a coat. More likely I'll get one that costs a bit more that has pockets for a phone, keys, water bottle.
customer_reviews.author: W. Howard

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a safety feature for walking in the dark or dim light. It is very reflective and comfortable to wear. The size large fits perfectly over my clothes and I believe it will work over a light jacket in cooler weather. So far it is holding up great. I do wish it had a loop at the top so I could easily hang it on a hook.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Does the job but
customer_reviews.text: It is very dark in our neighborhood and as in many neighborhoods some of our neighbors are in a hurry to get home. I purchased this to wear over my winter coats to walk my dogs in the evening and avoid being hit. It does the job well but is uncomfortable to wear if you have hair pass shoulder length. My hair kept being pulled by the fabric. I had to stop wearing it. If you have short hair and just want function then this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: JCTraveler

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: This vest is super light, reflective and shows up very well to oncoming traffic when you're out walking the dog at night. Like you'll see in other reviews, make sure you go up a size when you order. I wear a Large shirt so I bought an XL and it fits perfectly. I might get another one and go up 2 sizes because it is a little snug when going on over my winter coat.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Definitely High Visibility
customer_reviews.text: When they say high visibility, they are not kidding. Great for walking along the road during no light or low light conditions. You may get some drivers that flash you with their high beams but it is great to know they have seen you. The zipper must be European because it seems backwards to this old redneck. Good product, wear it often around traffic.
customer_reviews.author: Sam II

customer_reviews.title: Great reflective vest!
customer_reviews.text: This is great for visibility when I'm out walking my dog at night. I love that it zips...it keeps it securely on
customer_reviews.author: baker

customer_reviews.title: get pockets
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife for walking our dogs. I should have bought her a larger size and with pockets, since she often wears it over a winter coat. But if this is what you need and fits properly, it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Baumgarten

customer_reviews.title: Decent Temporary Work Vest
customer_reviews.text: The color and reflector material is good (to stand out and/or be seen at night). Good fit and zipper. They shrink a bit when machine dried on warmer settings. The threads also fray a bit after washing. I've bought 2 and each have lasted about a year (minimal washing, hang dry, trimming frayed threads).
customer_reviews.author: Tyrone E

customer_reviews.title: Exacltly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a reflective safety vest to go over my winter coveralls when I use my snow blower in the early morning and at night. The 2X vest was the perfect perfect size to fit over my size 44 Carhartt Yukon coveralls. I'm very happy with the vest and would buy another when I wear this one out.
customer_reviews.author: Scott V

customer_reviews.title: 5am runner
customer_reviews.text: This vest works perfectly for those who love an early morning run, but want to avoid being hit by a car. I run around my neighborhood at 5am and although there isn’t to much traffic at that time; it doesn’t hurt to be more visible to nieghborhood traffic.
customer_reviews.author: R. Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Very visible
customer_reviews.text: I wear this while riding my bike on busy streets and it helps remind drivers to give me 3 feet when passing. The reflective strips are very bright. It is comfortable, even though the smallest size is Medium, and the price was very affordable. It may also make me look like a construction worker. Maybe it would be a good accessory for Halloween.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really like it. Lucky for me because it fits perfect
customer_reviews.text: xlnt, I really like it. Lucky for me because it fits perfect. I am 5 feet 10 inches with a slender build at 155 lbs. The MEDIUM, over just a shirt, fits like a fitted tuxedo vest. Very bright and nice too....Finding the right size is about the only obstacle to keep this from being perfect. As others mentioned, you might want to buy a larger size than you are used to. Anyway, I like it much.
customer_reviews.author: stephen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for daytime activities
customer_reviews.text: I usually walk for 3.5 miles in the early, early morning and wear either a safety vest or safety windbreaker. But those were too hot if I walked later in the day. So, I ordered this vest. Keeps my arms bare and fits nicely over my T-shirt. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Mommuzamom

customer_reviews.title: Good to keep in car
customer_reviews.text: It's a simple, inexpensive Class 2 vest for my car emergency kit. I'm a woman's size S and got the M vest. It's huge on me with a T-shirt but fits over my insulated winter jackets, so it's usable year round. I'm happy with the choice.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: As described, as expected -- good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfectly serviceable and highly visible vest. the fabric is thin -- almost weightless -- and loose on a 5'6" 150 pound woman, which is just what I wanted for pre-dawn dog walking in the southern muggy summer. I wish it had a pocket or 2 but then it wouldn't cost $7. One could be sewn on easily if a person were motivated. Five starts because ya can't beat it for the price and it seems well made.
customer_reviews.author: SaraInCaryTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: visibility for motorcycles
customer_reviews.text: Got this for the early morning rides now that the sun comes up after I get to work. Ordered an XL and this fits over my leather jacket perfectly. For reference, I normally wear a size large t-shirt. As other's have said, all zippers have a personality, make sure you line the zipper up and it will work fine.
customer_reviews.author: M. disalvatore

customer_reviews.title: A must-have for walking in the dark.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for when I go walking early in the morning or late at night in the neighborhood. It increases my visibility quite a bit and makes me feel safer. I bought the next size up as other reviewers mentioned, and it fits very well.
customer_reviews.author: 5koliny

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I actually used this to make a hi vis vest for my dog. I cut it in half down the back and used the arm pit as his “collar/neck” after I took it in. I also added some extra clasps to wrap it around him. So my use is not typical but it does great for what we need and it stands up to my dog running and rolling.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: High visability, good fit and a great price!
customer_reviews.text: This safety vest is just exactly what we needed and we were so happy to find it at this great price! My husband walks the dog rather late and this time of year that can be dangerous. I followed the recommendations here and got one size larger than he usually takes and the fit over a heavy sweater or jacket is perfect. I can watch them walk way down the street --great visibility! I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy NiceTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Size is nowhere close to what was ordered
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a XXL vest. It was closer to a Medium fit than an XXL. No way am I going to be able to use this. I'll hand it down to a smaller member of our family. BTW, I ordered another vest from another provider in XXL and it fit.
customer_reviews.author: Tazman32

customer_reviews.title: Works but Zipper is BACKWARDS!
customer_reviews.text: I suspect this product is intended for occupational use. I purchased it for running and cycling. I found sizing a wee bit small - it fit as well as the same sized t-shirt, but would be uncomfortably tight over cold weather wear. Does a great job of helping me be seen, for which I'm grateful. However, have two complaints. First, mesh fabric is very stiff and so makes an annoying swishing noise with each stride. Secondly, and most annoyingly, the zipper is BACKWARDS! That is, the metal tab of the zipper comes off on the left side, not the right. Why - just why? Every other piece of clothing I own with a zipper is the other way round...
customer_reviews.author: Just some guy

customer_reviews.title: Highly visible
customer_reviews.text: I'm an early morning walker so this vest is perfect for my needs. I have a small frame so I bought a medium and it fits over my layers of clothing with room to spare. It's light weight and easy to put on and take off. This is a great vest for the price.
customer_reviews.author: S. A. Renfrow

customer_reviews.title: SIZE & ZIPPER WRONG
customer_reviews.text: I BOUGHT THIS FOR A CAR EMERGENCY I'm 5 '6" but will send back for a large rather than a medium to accommodate winter clothing I would prefer a large zipper that is easy to engage Also the zipper is the opposite (left/right right/left) from what a man would expect
customer_reviews.author: A C Mason

customer_reviews.title: Motorcyclist read! Grab!
customer_reviews.text: I ride my motorcycle day and night and so visibility ad safety is my number one priority. I wear it when it starts to get dark. This jacket is so visible and has reflectors also. Great vest I recommend to anyone that rides at night time.
customer_reviews.author: Chien

customer_reviews.title: Way too big and return window is less than a month
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this based on the size described; however, the item is way too big. Because of illness, we were not able to return it immediately and now we cannot return it. The window for returning it was less than a month.
customer_reviews.author: Edoann

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for bikin
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sized a bit big for bicycling and it is perfect because it will fit over a small backpack if I need that, and also works fine with no backpack. I feel much safer riding at twilight or when the sun is in the drivers' eyes. It is very lightweight, cool, and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Allan A. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and Very Reflective
customer_reviews.text: This is very lightweight (which is good) and is very reflective at night as I use this while walking the neighborhood after dark. About the only nit is the zipper pull is on the left-hand side and not the right: if that is my only issue things are going well. If you are looking for a lightweight and economical safety vest, I would recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: Good value - keeps you visible
customer_reviews.text: Not fashionable but kept me from being hit by cars at night while walking this winter. I followed the advice in other reviews and ordered larger than needed to fit over my coat, but I probably could have ordered truer to size, and the vest would be less baggy.
customer_reviews.author: Voracious Procrastinator

customer_reviews.title: Great Visibility
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a stranger always seen riding a bicycle down our road before daylight. Wife was concerned he would get hit, he couldn't bee seen until you were right there at him, so I bought it for him. She stopped him a few days later when she saw him (apparently a young man in his late teens/early 20's going to college or work?) and gave it to him. He was VERY thankful, and immediately put it on. Saw him two days later from almost 1/4 mile away! We're happy, He's happy...
customer_reviews.author: Wesley Mcguire

customer_reviews.title: I am noticeable to traffic
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to wear over my very puffy winter coat. Its super huge so this worked just wish there were pockets as I keep trying to place my phone in it as it covers my coat pockets. However, that is such a small thing as really I needed it so cars would see me in the dark winter mornings when I was walking my dog and still wanted to be in full winter gear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very bright, cars definitely notice this when walking!
customer_reviews.text: With daylight savings, it makes walking after 4 or 5 PM on the East Coast a little tricky. This vest definitely gets noticed as I see cars slow down and veer just slightly away from me. I bought the largest size, XXX, as I wanted to make sure it would fit over sweaters and a winter jacket. A smart purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Raildig

customer_reviews.title: Good for walking dog at nigh
customer_reviews.text: The vest has high visibility. You cannot miss it front, side and back. As anything you wear in colder climates you need to buy way larger than what you normally wear to allow for layering underneath.
customer_reviews.author: MEA

customer_reviews.title: Good for short period. Cheap enough to replace often.
customer_reviews.text: Good that it’s cheap and easy replaced. Reflective stripes wear quickly. I work at a warehouse and am required to wear a reflective vest whenever using a forklift. Purchased my own so I wouldn’t have to wear one full of sweat and smells at work. 2 months of washing every other work day and it’s falling apart and losing reflectivity.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Espinoza

customer_reviews.title: NEIKO VEST FOR HIGH VISIBILITY
customer_reviews.text: I bought four of these vests because my wife and I sometimes ride our bikes on the shoulders of certain highways. The vests are highly visibility; they are inexpensive and as a an added bonus, drivers tend to be more careful because they assume you want to keep on living. I would recommend the XXL size, because it is none to big, and if you are out in the cold, they fit better over a jacket. They are a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Mike G

customer_reviews.title: Bus driver no longer has trouble seeing me in the dark!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I take a bus at 6:00 AM and the stop is in the middle of the block and unlit. A few times the driver did not see me waiting. Now by his own admission, he has no problem. I just wish this nice vest had pockets!
customer_reviews.author: PF

customer_reviews.title: Size misleading, decent value
customer_reviews.text: Made for orientals... the largest size won't fit an XL, or a L if wearing a jacket. Very light weight, but well made... great for kids or smaller persons, at the price.
customer_reviews.author: Author: H. Michael Sweeney

customer_reviews.title: Order bigger
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a large for my husband to use at work but got a small. Couldn’t even use it.
customer_reviews.author: Emiley

customer_reviews.title: WRONG SIZE
customer_reviews.text: The material is nice and perfect for the job I'm at, but I had to order a size up, waiting on my replacement soon! Go a size up. Edit: I got my replacement and it was a Large Instead of an XX Large..had to buy another one for my job
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended for women with  hips.
customer_reviews.text: Sized for a man, bought a size up in hopes it would fit my hips, then another size up - no go. Not recommended for women with hips.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra A.

customer_reviews.title: Great and cheap option for bike rides
customer_reviews.text: As good as it gets for cheap reflective vests. I wanted this for biking and it does the job. Not 5 stars since I would want something more like a casual sporting vest with the reflective bands, but options designed for bicycling cost $50 or more. The material is good quality and not like other cheap mesh options. The zipper is also of good quality, and the fit matches the usual sizing.
customer_reviews.author: Faheem

customer_reviews.title: zipper fabric not sticked well
customer_reviews.text: It’s great for the price and for the purpose of bike riding at night. The first time used, the fabric ripped from the zipper—I’ll sew it back together, its’s just not very durable. Overall, it’s great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Very poorly made
customer_reviews.text: Total garbage! The very 1st day I wore this vest at work, the zipper ripped off. Very poorly made. DO NOT waste your money. I had to get a refund from Amazon. Buy anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Monika J

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: I use this vest rarely when marking roads for bicycle routes when I want visibility to traffic. They are inexpensive and work fine for my purpose but would not like stand up to regular use.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff2468

customer_reviews.title: Size up!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered an XL and found it too small to zip up comfortably. For reference, I am a female and wear 1X (plus) for tops, D cup bra. If I don't have a coat on, it zips, but very tight. I purchased to walk to work in a high traffic area. The visibility helps!
customer_reviews.author: emalee

customer_reviews.title: smooth comfortable fabric
customer_reviews.text: True to size. I always wear an XL and it fit great with some room to move around. My 16 year old wears a M/L and the medium fit him perfect. The Large also works for him. These look really nice. Great bang for the buck. No reason to spend more.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Beware of sizing issue
customer_reviews.text: Although I cannot attest to this vest's longevity, it seems to work well for what it is. It's bright and does its job well. CAUTION ABOUT SIZING: It may be worth getting one to two sizes bigger than you're normally accustomed to. The normal size you get may be skin-tight. So if you wear a medium, get a large or extra large. Otherwise does its job.
customer_reviews.author: R. Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Bad Zipper
customer_reviews.text: Zipper broke after three days of work using this. I feel like I wasted my money now. I got a large and it's definitely the right size for me. I'm 5'6 - 5'8 and normal weight.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Good safety item for walking
customer_reviews.text: Light, reflective, XL fits easily over heavy winter jacket when walking in the winter- buy the size of vest depending on 1) your body size and 2) whether you’ll be putting it over bulky winter clothing
customer_reviews.author: islander

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive and provides peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: I got this to keep in the trunk of the car along with the rest of the car maintenance items. It provided a ton of peace of mind when having to change a flat tire on the side of the road. Cars slowed down because they could see the vest. PROS: - Inexpensive. - Highly reflective for added visibility CONS: - No pockets Other notes: - I haven't tried to wash it, so I'm unsure how the stitching and reflective pieces hold up after that. - Size UP if you live in an area where the most likely scenario is you wearing this over a coat.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Great Safety Vest
customer_reviews.text: This vest is well made. I am 5' 8" and medium build. I bought the large size and it fits great. When I go for walks at night and it's cold out I wear 2 coats and the vest fits fine over the two coats. I would highly recommend this vest.
customer_reviews.author: TPS

customer_reviews.title: On my essential bikers gear list...
customer_reviews.text: I bought a few of these for myself and other casual cyclists in the family. We're a family prone too owning too much black clothing, so this helps when riding at night. They're fantastic - the metallic silver bits shine brightly in front of car headlights and street lights. The neon is quite neon, too. I've machine washed them a few times (and air dried) with no loss in brightness or other issues. The short zipper keeps the vest from flapping in the wind, and I prefer it over similar vests with velcro closures. There are no pockets, which is favoured by me, but if you prefer pockets, there are other pocketed versions on Amazon as well.
customer_reviews.author: vanilllacoke

customer_reviews.title: Careful with size
customer_reviews.text: More and more I realize how important these reflector vests are. I think, they are much more useful than low power bike lights Be careful with sizes...I am L , but I got XL after reading the reviews here and I am glad I read the reviews. Remember that you gonna wear this on top of your other clothes...In fall season XL is a good fit for me (shirt + fleece + vest)... In winter (boston) I might even need XXL (shirt + fleece + coat + vest)
customer_reviews.author: A. Konik

customer_reviews.title: Visibility
customer_reviews.text: I love this hi-visibility vest. I use it at night for work. I make deliveries every morning starting around 3am. I never want to be mistaken for a burglar so I bought the vest to be highly visible.
customer_reviews.author: Crooklyn

customer_reviews.title: Low featured, but great value.
customer_reviews.text: After a couple of close calls while walking in the early morning last winter, I decided that I needed to make myself more visible during my walks. After reading the reviews of this particular vest from previous purchasers, I happened to select the correct size (2XL to go over my winter coat), and though it doesn't have a lot of extras (like pockets), it does do what is needed, and I definitely felt safer, and was more visible. I may purchase one or two more in different sizes, for different seasons (to fit the different coats/sweaters that I might wear underneath).
customer_reviews.author: DJAmund

customer_reviews.title: Quality is Average at Best
customer_reviews.text: Could be and should, Better Quality... I use this for Biking into the Office in WDC. Bright and Reflects well in the Dark and Low Light Conditions. Made for Spring, Summer and Fall Conditions. For Winter, Order a Size or Two Large than normally required. Safety First...! Amazon does not need to ship this in a Box Big Enough for a Full Length Mink Coat....? Please save money and ship in an envelope please!!! ~ Thank you ~
customer_reviews.author: Hard Working American

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for emergencies
customer_reviews.text: Very bright and fits just as other customers recommended, to go up one size. I did just that and I can wear over a coat without a problem. Well made I am very happy with the vest I bought
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: true to size, lightweight, good price...didn't buy to work out in so can't rate and for durability, too soon to know but i think this quality is excellent for the price...good value.
customer_reviews.author: ca8050

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a nice simple vest. Material is quite soft, not plasticy. The retro on it actually looks rather gray until you shine light on it, not like the whitish retroreflective tape you may have seen elsewhere. If I have issues I'll update this, but for now I'm very satisfied with this product. I normally where a large but ordered an extra large, which fits with some room to spare if I need to wear it over a coat. I purchased this for bicycling early in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Chaya Brenan

customer_reviews.title: Small small small
customer_reviews.text: Is this thing made for kids or what? Cause it’s tiny!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good vest, just short
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a men’s medium which normally would always fit me...I’m a 5’8” 140lb woman and it fits fine everywhere else other than being super short! It’ll work for what I need it for...running in the dark.
customer_reviews.author: Micah

customer_reviews.title: Very Good for our needs.
customer_reviews.text: We're going to use the vests in case of roadside breakdowns while RVing. Vests are lightweight - good for our Florida weather. Very bright and seeable: seems like a very good product at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Albert Biagini

customer_reviews.title: I've tried many, this is the best
customer_reviews.text: We walk a lot with our family and everyone (from age 2 on up) wears a safety vest since we're it gets dark around 4 p.m. I tried a variety of vests and they fell apart. This one is the best vest! It is highly visible and comfortable (not stiff and chaffing like the others). I snoozed and didn't get the kid size ones when they were available but it was easy enough to tuck the front and sew it down so it fits the kids. They are so much more visible (we were almost run over a couple of times) and we feel a ton safer wearing these when we're out for our evening walk. Very affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Runs small.
customer_reviews.text: All of my hi-vis vests are the same size yet this one is a bit tight rather than slightly loose like the rest. Other than that it does have great visibility, just order a size larger than what you need.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I use thes at night mostly becuse i have a black winter coat and all my outher coats are darker in color so theas make me feal safer at night when i have to walk arround outside
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: To small
customer_reviews.text: Too small I ordered xxl receive small items cant use it please send big one as I ordered xxi
customer_reviews.author: Amos Tayar

customer_reviews.title: hiking! backpacking! night walking!
customer_reviews.text: ideal for hiking/ backpacking in areas where being visible is really important, super inexpensive. can be tied around you or your pack like a flag or just worn to protect your nice clothing or gear from scuffs and scratches. highly recommend, never hike in parks with hunters without some sort of clothing like this.
customer_reviews.author: amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: It's good...
customer_reviews.text: I work in a job where the safety vest easily gets caught on sharp edges. This one didn't last long. One I get locally for more money, lasts much longer. I gave this a second try. Mostly because of price. I'm not having problems. This gets torn up about the same as the other for more money. Can't wash the other more than ten times before it falls apart. Says so on the tag. So why pay the money? I'm settling with this one. Might as well. None of them will last very long. During hot summer. I don't use any vest. It's too hot. Use a strap like reflective thing.
customer_reviews.author: rnaple

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: I use these for my pre dawn or post dusk walks. Very reflective when headlights or streetlights hit it. Makes me more comfortable that drivers will see me. I bought a size or two up to wear over my coat.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Bright, light, tight
customer_reviews.text: XXXL barely fits my belly with no shirt on and I'm not all that huge but it is very long, for tall guys. If you are over 300 lb this is too small for you. I'm 295. Materials look fine for a meshed cool vest. The zipper pull is on the wrong side, for left handed people I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Budget price and budget quality
customer_reviews.text: Budget price and budget quality. You get what you pay for here. This will be fine if all you are going to do is go for a walk or bike ride with it. But if you need hi-vis for work and will be wearing all day, then you will need higher quality, like Occunomix. Also, as other reviewers noted, item not properly sized, so you will need to order couple sizes up. I normally wear medium. Based on reviewer advice, I ordered an XL and it was just right.
customer_reviews.author: Flamingo

customer_reviews.title: Sizing a bit small but overall a good vest.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased an XL size to it would fit over a light windbreaker. Unfortunately, it's a little tight. So it's probably a good idea to go up at least a size or two if you plan on wearing this over a heavy jacket. Another thing: Initially I didn't think it was important, but within a couple hours of wearing the vest I wished it had a pocket of some kind. Other than that, I definitely think it's a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

product_meta.title: Neiko 53941A High Visibility Safety Vest, Large, Neon Yellow
product_meta.description: Style:LargePremium Safety Vest meets ANSI/ISEA Standard. Construct with breathable mesh fabric with front zipper. Height visibility neon yellow color. Size selection from Medium to XXX-Large
feature_bullets: HIGH VISIBILITY: fluorescent yellow safety vest keeps you safe and reduces risks of accident for construction, surveyors, roadside emergency, bicycling and many more applications
REFLECTIVE STRIPS: 2 vertical and 2 horizontal reflective strips with 2” width on both front and back for maximum visibility in all weather and light conditions
MAXIMUM BREATHABLILITY: lightweight and comfortable 100% polyester fabric (Model in pictures is wearing a Large - we recommend sizing 1 size up for a slimmer fit and 2-3 sizes for a looser fit)
QUICK EASY ZIPPER: front zipper closure design for easy on and off
ANSI/ ISEA 107-2010 (former edition 107-2004) Class 2 standard of high-visibility safety apparel

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars3,962 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
